title: LunaWatch - Moon Watch Face
summary: Your moon on your wrist. The moon phase watch face.
description: LunaWatch Watch face shows the moon and it's current moon phase as seen from your location on earth. The perfect watch face for lunar enthusiasts.The location is by default set to Berlin.Buy LunaWatch Premium Settings by In-App purchase to costumize the look of your LunaWatch.LunaWatch Premium Settings lets you modify:- apperance of the moon- position coordinates- detail colors- show/hide border around moon- show/hide date- show/hide second hand- show/hide dots- show/hide and modify titleLuna Watch fits perfectly to round smartwatches like Moto 360 or LG G Watch R, but is also nice for squared ones like the ASUS ZenWatch.
descriptionHTML:
LunaWatch Watch face shows the moon and it's current moon phase as seen from your location on earth. The perfect watch face for lunar enthusiasts.

The location is by default set to Berlin.

Buy LunaWatch Premium Settings by In-App purchase to costumize the look of your LunaWatch.

LunaWatch Premium Settings lets you modify:
- apperance of the moon
- position coordinates
- detail colors
- show/hide border around moon
- show/hide date
- show/hide second hand
- show/hide dots
- show/hide and modify title

Luna Watch fits perfectly to round smartwatches like Moto 360 or LG G Watch R, but is also nice for squared ones like the ASUS ZenWatch.
comments: Very sharp moon! I would really like the option for "line" hour indicators or Roman Numerals instead of the "dot" indicators.

Brilliant app I love this moon face watch,I have the free version just now but will definitely upgrade,not sure how to do this yet,maybe I have to uninstall app and install again,thanks upgraded on 10/8/15
